post.summary: Creates a new administrator user account.
post.description:
Creates a new administrator with the provided registration details.
Only users with Manager role are authorized to perform this action.

Sample request:
POST /api/admin/newAdmin/create
Authorization: Bearer {manager-token}
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "email": "admin@example.com",
  "password": "SecurePass123!",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "phoneNumber": "12345678901",
  "dateOfBirth": "1990-01-01"
}

201.description: Returns the newly created admin user

400.description: If the request data is invalid

409.description: If the email is already registered

401.description: If the request is not authenticated

403.description: If the authenticated user is not a Manager

get.summary: Retrieves a specific admin by ID

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the admin

401.description: User is not authenticated or authorized

delete.summary: Deletes an administrator user from the system
delete.description:
Sample request:

    DELETE /api/admin/12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc
    
Only users with Manager role can perform this operation.

parameters.name: adminId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the admin to delete

401.description: User is not authenticated or lacks Manager role

404.description: Admin with specified ID is not found

Bearer.description:
JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. 
                      Enter your token in the text input below (without 'Bearer' prefix).
                      Example: 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...'
